column1: '''''Bogans''''' is a 26-minute fan film, written by [[Peter Tait]]. It was released on DVD in [[2003]].

column2: Bogans]]", Greg, Ray and Luke, travel across [[New Zealand]] to meet [[Peter Jackson]]. Their goal: be cast as an extra in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

column1: In a strange turn of fate, two of the actors actually ended up in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'': [[Ian Hughes]] played [[Irolas]], and [[Peter Tait]] was [[Shagrat]].
